content.query:
-- Explore data from CosmosDB RetailSales container

SELECT 
    *
FROM OPENROWSET(
            'CosmosDB'
            ,'account=cosmosdbsynapseaccount;database=RetailSalesDemoDB;key=2cAAmr4JVyCqSzL4qnWPnGrcK8ZyrCK6TBzo3Pblx2vLHxHvaf9RjZxcZg6c9rojmcaSyOVpp3aifPLxZwim4Q==;region='
            ,[RetailSales]
    )
    WITH (
        [logQuantity] varchar (30),
        [productCode] varchar (30),
        [quantity] varchar (30),
        [price] varchar (30),
        [advertising] varchar (30),
        [id] varchar (100),
        [storeId] varchar (30),
        [weekStarting] varchar (30)
    ) As StoreDetails
ORDER BY productCode, WeekStarting
